Title: South Lake
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The last sessions of the founding congress of the Communist Party of China were held in July 1921 on a boat in South Lake, Jiaxing, which later became a place of pilgrimage.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
中国共产党全国代表大会
